events.message: I received my order last week but I would like to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I want to return it.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to their request for a money back and return of the product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding their recent purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the product? This will help us to proceed quickly.
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. The product does not match the description on the website, so I don't want to keep it.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate a full refund once the product is returned. I will send you a prepaid shipping label to facilitate the return.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help in making the return process easy.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Please use it to return the product, and once received, the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you have returned the product and to let us know if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I have sent the product back yesterday. Thank you for your support throughout the process!
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on our refund handling process.
